connections.name: Texas Instruments XDS110 USB Debug Probe

debuggerSettings.data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no" ?>
<PropertyValues>

  <property id="PreventStepIntoAsm">
    <curValue>0</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="ResetOnRestart">
    <curValue>0</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="RestartOnSymbolLoad">
    <curValue>0</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="LowPowerRunMode">
    <curValue>1</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="SyncBreakpointsAndSymbols">
    <curValue>Synchronize breakpoints and symbols (with like cores), as well as execution</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="UseLegacyStopMode">
    <curValue>0</curValue>
  </property>

  <property id="FlashFiles">
    <curValue></curValue>
  </property>

</PropertyValues>
